project.description:
# Create docker network, so that container's ip persist docker network create --subnet=172.18.0.0/16 longruncluster
cat > /root/provision_longruncluster.sh << EOF #!/bin/bash -e docker stop kitchen-cluster-node1 kitchen-cluster-node2 kitchen-cluster-node3 docker rm kitchen-cluster-node1 kitchen-cluster-node2 kitchen-cluster-node3
rm -rf /data/docker/longruncluster/ && mkdir -p /data/docker/longruncluster/couchbase1 /data/docker/longruncluster/couchbase2 /data/docker/longruncluster/couchbase3
docker run -t -d -h kitchen-cluster-node1 --name kitchen-cluster-node1 --privileged -p 5122:22 --net=longruncluster --ip 172.18.0.22 -v /data/docker/longruncluster/couchbase1:/opt/couchbase denny/aio:latest /usr/sbin/sshd -D docker run -t -d -h kitchen-cluster-node2 --name kitchen-cluster-node2 --privileged -p 5123:22 --net=longruncluster --ip 172.18.0.23 -v /data/docker/longruncluster/couchbase2:/opt/couchbase denny/aio:latest /usr/sbin/sshd -D docker run -t -d -h kitchen-cluster-node3 --name kitchen-cluster-node3 --privileged -p 5124:22 --net=longruncluster --ip 172.18.0.24 -v /data/docker/longruncluster/couchbase3:/opt/couchbase denny/aio:latest /usr/sbin/sshd -D
docker exec -it kitchen-cluster-node1 wget -O /root/devops_provision_os.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DennyZhang/devops_public/master/chef/devops_provision_os.sh docker exec -it kitchen-cluster-node2 wget -O /root/devops_provision_os.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DennyZhang/devops_public/master/chef/devops_provision_os.sh docker exec -it kitchen-cluster-node3 wget -O /root/devops_provision_os.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DennyZhang/devops_public/master/chef/devops_provision_os.sh
docker exec -it kitchen-cluster-node1 bash /root/devops_provision_os.sh docker exec -it kitchen-cluster-node2 bash /root/devops_provision_os.sh docker exec -it kitchen-cluster-node3 bash /root/devops_provision_os.sh
EOF
bash /root/provision_longruncluster.sh
# For initial setup: # 1. Run for first time, set initialize_system true, STOP_CONTAINER false # 2. Run for second time, with everything default

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -e function download_script() { local download_file=${1?} . /etc/profile [ -n "$DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME" ] || export DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME="tag_v2" working_dir="/var/lib/jenkins/code/devops_public" bash_script="${working_dir}/${download_file}" dir_name=$(dirname "$bash_script")
export DOWNLOAD_PREFIX="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DennyZhang/devops_public/${DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME}" if [ ! -f "$bash_script" ]; then mkdir -p "$dir_name" wget -O "$bash_script" "${DOWNLOAD_PREFIX}/jenkins_scripts/${download_file}" chmod 755 "$bash_script" fi } ################################################################################ download_file="chef/deploy_cluster.sh" download_script "$download_file" bash -e "/var/lib/jenkins/code/devops_public/$download_file"
